short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights changed inputs and checkboxes in Keepa Product Finder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keepa Checkbox and Input Highlighter automatically highlights filled input fields and checked checkboxes on Keepa's Product Finder pages. Enhance your Keepa experience by quickly identifying modified fields, making it easier to track changes and streamline your product search. Perfect for frequent Keepa users who want a more efficient and visual way to manage their searches
